pr_title: Enable package installer to load non-Conformance resources

timeline.message: Enable package installer to load resources other than conformance resources.

timeline.bodyText: You should probably deal with the null case here (and maybe also rename that "my" variable since it's not a field) - I'm not actually sure what would happen here in the case of something that didn't have a URL or an identifier, but it's probably safe to just not upload it in that case.
timeline.author: jamesagnew

replies.bodyText: Good point. I have changed this to throw an UnsupportedOperationException if the resource has no identifier and added a corresponding JUnit test for this case.
replies.author: IanMMarshall

timeline.message: Add changelog for package installer enhancement.
Throw exception if any resources in package have no url and no identifier.
